participant_1.background:
I spend most of my time out with friends, so I don't get to see my family as much as I'd like.
i have 3 sisters and 2 brothers.
i cannot get enough ginger snaps.
i have been bankrupt and back.
I enjoy a glass of red wine with my dinner, but since breaking my leg, I have been sticking to water.

participant_2.background:
My time is more precious than my wedding ring.
I enjoy exercising and try to work out as often as I can, but it can be hard to find the time, especially with my night shift schedule.
I like dressing up for special occasions, but I prefer to wear comfortable clothing on a regular day.
i am a student at a small community college.
I once ate ice cream in my underwear in public, but then I realized people were staring at me, so I ran away.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello! How are you today?
I'm doing well! Thanks for asking.
That's good to hear! I am doing well too.
That's great! What are you up to today?
I'm just getting ready to go to class.
Oh cool! What are you studying?
I'm studying nursing at a community college.
Oh nice! That's a great field to go into.
Thanks! I think so too.
What made you decide to study nursing?
I've always wanted to help people, and I think nursing is a great way to do that.
That's a great reason! I'm sure you'll be a great nurse.
Thanks! I hope so!
I'm sure you will be. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to exercise, read, and spend time with my friends and family.
Oh cool! I like to exercise too. What kind of exercises do you like to do?
I like to run, lift weights, and do yoga.
Oh nice! I like to run and lift weights too.
That's great! We should workout together sometime.
That would be fun
